lines.text: Everybody knows that Steve McGarrett only takes orders from the governor and God - and occassionally even they have trouble.
As we clever Chinese say, "The plot thickens..."
Chief called from Hilo... they picked up that official from Hong Kong on your orders. they're holding him for deportation.
Attorney General thinks that we're on thin ice.
Well, by the time that ice cracks, we'll have that hot shot back in Hong Kong, huh?

[Brent won't work with McGarrett]
Believe me, that's no way to treat McGarrett.

[McGarrett storms into Brents office]
Don't you ever put a tail on me again!
Look Brent... Get this and get it straight!... Don't you ever put a tail on me again!

[Surveying the Arcturis]
Just another tanker that logged a million miles and rusted through a thousand coats of red lead.

[Wo Fat has McGarrett]
I want you at your best, Mr. McGarrett... The top of your stick so to speak.

[McGarrett is having drinks with Rosemary]
Well, what should we drink to, Steven?
